9
10#undef _LIBCPP_EXTERN_TEMPLATE
11#define _LIBCPP_EXTERN_TEMPLATE(...) extern template __VA_ARGS__;
12
13#include "valarray"
14
15_LIBCPP_BEGIN_NAMESPACE_STD
16
17template valarray<size_t>::valarray(size_t);
18template valarray<size_t>::~valarray();
19template void valarray<size_t>::resize(size_t, size_t);
20
21void
22gslice::__init(size_t __start)
23{
24 valarray<size_t> __indices(__size_.size());
25 size_t __k = __size_.size() != 0;
26 for (size_t __i = 0; __i < __size_.size(); ++__i)
27 __k *= __size_[__i];
28 __1d_.resize(__k);
29 if (__1d_.size())
30 {
31 __k = 0;
32 __1d_[__k] = __start;
33 while (true)
34 {
35 size_t __i = __indices.size() - 1;
36 while (true)
37 {
38 if (++__indices[__i] < __size_[__i])
39 {
40 ++__k;
41 __1d_[__k] = __1d_[__k-1] + __stride_[__i];
42 for (size_t __j = __i + 1; __j != __indices.size(); ++__j)
43 __1d_[__k] -= __stride_[__j] * (__size_[__j] - 1);
44 break;
45 }
46 else
47 {
48 if (__i == 0)
49 return;
50 __indices[__i--] = 0;
51 }
52 }
53 }
54 }
55}
56
57_LIBCPP_END_NAMESPACE_STD
58
